content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mr. Wang, let's negotiate the rental price. I want to get the highest price possible. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the prime location and excellent facilities nearby, I propose a rental price of 850 Euros per month. I'm confident this apartment will suit your needs and am open to further discussions.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, but I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: With the apartment's appeal and high demand in the city center, I can lower my flexibility slightly but still suggest a rental price of 900 Euros per month. This reflects the exceptional value of living in this newly built property.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Your offer is getting closer to my expectations, but I am still looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understanding your desire for a premium rental, I am now willing to propose a rental price of 925 Euros per month for this exceptional apartment. I believe this price represents a fair compromise and the opportunity to live in a superb location.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Your offer is very close to my expectations. Let's make this deal. I agree to the price of 950 Euros per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Excellent news! We have reached an agreement. I confirm the rental price at 950 Euros per month. Let's proceed with the lease signing and preparations for your move-in. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
